Plan your future.
Build your wealth.
Achieve your goals.

Join Switch today to gain easy access to multi currency savings, cheaper transfers and the best lending, investment and insurance products in Nigeria.

A one stop shop for financial services.

Switch is more than your traditional digital bank. It is also your wealth manager. Bringing to you a rich selection of the very best investment, lending and insurance products in Nigeria, from anywhere in the world, so that you can make the best decisions for your finances. Get started today.

Send Money Home For Free

Enjoy zero-fee cross-border transfers to Nigerian bank accounts – through your bank card or with cash - for the first 6 months after you sign up to Switch. Afterwards, send money to Nigerian bank accounts at 3%.

Open A Nigerian Bank Account In Minutes

We’ve eliminated all the hassles that traditionally come with opening a Nigerian bank account. On Switch, wherever you are in the world, with just a few clicks, you can now enjoy all the benefits of having a Nigerian bank account .

Build Wealth

Let your money work hard for you. Get massive returns on your investment when you invest in treasury bills, stocks, bonds, prime real estate, agriculture and many more, all in one place.

Worthwhile Savings

Whether it’s for a much deserved holiday trip or an important career certification exam, Switch enables you to automate your savings and earn 10% interest through our collection of savings products.

No Hidden Fees

Switch runs a very lean structure with lower costs. We’ve passed on this savings in costs to you in the form of lower transaction fees.

Fund your account₦0
Transfer to another Switch Account₦0
Account Maintenance Fee ₦0
Request a Payment (deposit)₦0
Transfer to Nigerian Bank Account₦25
Paying Bills₦80

How Safe Is My Money?

Switch is powered by Sterling bank, a CBN approved financial institution. All funds are held in the bank and are fully insured by the NDIC.
